member.name: T:kCura.EventHandler.FileValue
member.summary: Creates file field value instances.

member.name: P:kCura.EventHandler.FileValue.FileContents
member.summary: Returns the file contents created in the constructor

member.name: P:kCura.EventHandler.FileValue.FileName
member.summary: Returns the name of the file.

member.name: P:kCura.EventHandler.FileValue.FilePath
member.summary: Returns the fully qualified path of the file.
member.returns: Returns the path of the file on disk.
member.remarks: On PreSave event handlers, if a new file has been uploaded, this will be the path provided by the browser. Else, it will be the path to the file as stored in Relativity. If the user creates a new FileValue object during an EventHandler operation, this will be an empty string.

member.name: P:kCura.EventHandler.FileValue.FileStream
member.summary: Returns the stream of the file.
member.returns: Returns a stream of the file.
member.remarks: Each invocation of this returns a new stream. The caller is responsible for properly disposing of it.

member.name: M:kCura.EventHandler.FileValue.#ctor(System.String,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FileValue class.
member.param: The display name to associate with the new file.
The input stream of the data to store as the new file. The stream must be readable and the total length of the content must not exceed 1GB.
member.remarks: The contents of the stream are stored internally as a byte array. The caller is responsible for properly disposing of the input stream provided.

member.name: M:kCura.EventHandler.FileValue.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FileValue class.
member.param: The fully qualified path to the file uploaded.
The name of the file uploaded.
The stream of the file. The stream must be readable.
member.remarks: This constructor is intended for internal use only. It will be called by Relativity when the File field has a file that was just uploaded by the user.

member.name: M:kCura.EventHandler.FileValue.#ctor(System.String,System.String,kCura.EventHandler.IStreamFactory)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FileValue class.
member.param: The name of the file.
The path of the file on disk.
The factory used to generate FileStream.
member.remarks: This constructor is intended for internal use only. It will be called by Relativity when the File field references an existing file in the Relativity file share.

member.name: T:kCura.EventHandler.ICanExecuteWithLimitedContext
member.summary: Functions as a marker interface for executing event handlers without context information through the Object Manager service.
member.remarks: The Object Manager service includes operations for create, read, and update, which require a CallingContext object. This object contains information about the web context from which the event handler is being called, such as the originator of the call, the page mode, and the related layout. If this context information isn’t required, you can set the CallingContext object to null, but your event handler must implement the ICanExecuteWithLimitedContext interface. For more information about this service, see the Relativity.Services.Object and Relativity.Services.Objects.Models.WebContent namespaces in the Relativity Services API.

member.name: T:kCura.EventHandler.ISuppressDelete
member.summary: When implemented by a PreCascadeDeleteEventHandler, signals that the event handler will execute the delete instead of Relativity. With this event handler, default delete behavior can be continued as normal by adding the ContinueDefaultDelete PostExecuteAction to the event hander's Execute response

member.name: M:kCura.EventHandler.DatabaseConnection.ExecuteNonQuery(System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Executes a Transact-SQL statement against the connection and returns the number of rows affected.
member.param: SQL statement to be executed.
SQL parameters used in SQL statement.
Number of seconds after which a SQL query should time out. Default value: -1 meaning execution of a SQL statement should never expire.
member.returns: Returns an integer value indicating the number of rows affected

member.name: M:kCura.EventHandler.DatabaseConnection.ExecuteAsDataSet(System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Executes a Transact-SQL statement against the connection and returns a dataset object.
member.param: SQL statement to be executed.
SQL parameters used in SQL statement.
Number of seconds after which a SQL query should time out. The default value (-1) indicates that the execution of a SQL statement should never expire.
member.returns: Returns a dataset object.

member.name: M:kCura.EventHandler.DatabaseConnection.ExecuteAsScalar(System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query. Additional columns or rows are ignored.
member.param: SQL statement to be executed.
SQL parameters used in SQL statement.
Number of seconds after which a SQL query should time out. Default value: -1 meaning execution of a SQL statement should never expire.
member.returns: returns an Object type that contains the result of the sql operation

member.name: T:kCura.EventHandler.Helper
member.summary: Helper class containing numerous enums useful for event handlers.

member.name: M:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Helper class.

member.name: T:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType
member.summary: Enum specifying event handler types.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.PreSave
member.summary: Pre save event handler type.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.PostSave
member.summary: Post save event handler type.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.PreDelete
member.summary: Pre delete event handler type.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.Console
member.summary: Console event handler type.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.PreLoad
member.summary: Pre load event handler type.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.PreCascadeDelete
member.summary: Pre cascade delete event handler type.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.PreInstall
member.summary: Pre application install event handler type.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.PostInstall
member.summary: Post application install event handler type.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.RunOncePreInstall
member.summary: Pre application install event handler type that runs only once.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.RunOncePostInstall
member.summary: Post application install event handler type that runs only once.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.PreMassDelete
member.summary: Pre mass delete event handler runs once before a mass deletion.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.PreUninstall
member.summary: Pre Uninstall event handler type.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.PageInteraction
member.summary: Page interaction event handler runs once per edit or view page and is used to register client scripts.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.PostWorkspaceCreation
member.summary: Post workspace creation event handler is run after a case with the application containing it used as a template to make a new workspace.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.XMLStatistics
member.summary: Statistics event handler is run by the case statistics manager.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.MassOperation
member.summary: Custom Mass Operation are run on the list item page.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.CSVStatistics
member.summary: Statistics event handler is run by the case statistics manager.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.PreWorkspaceDelete
member.summary: Pre workspace delete event handler is run before a workspace with the application containing it is marked for delete.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.PreWorkspaceDisable
member.summary: Pre workspace disable event handler is run before a workspace with the application containing it is marked disabled.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.PreCopy
member.summary: Pre Copy event handler is run on a Mask DTO on the source data, but before that source data is passed to the Create call.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.Save
member.summary: Save event handler is run instead of pre and post save

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.EventHandlerType.PostCopy
member.summary: Post Copy event handler is run on a newly copied Mask DTO.

member.name: T:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.RunTargets
member.summary: An enum type which specifies values available for a RunTarget custom attribute class.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.RunTargets.Workspace
member.summary: Event handlers should run against a workspace database context

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.RunTargets.Environment
member.summary: Event handlers should run against an instance level context

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.RunTargets.Instance
member.summary: Event handlers should run against an instance level context

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.Helper.RunTargets.InstanceAndWorkspace
member.summary: Event handlers that can run against either the instance or workspace level database contexts

Value of a field to be created.
List of GUIDs associated with a field.

member.name: T:kCura.EventHandler.UriImprinter
member.summary: Imprints a query value onto a URL.

member.name: F:kCura.EventHandler.UriImprinter.QUERYSTRING_FINGERPRINT_KEY
member.summary: Default Query String Fingerprint.

member.name: P:kCura.EventHandler.UriImprinter.VersionString
member.summary: Default Version String.

member.name: M:kCura.EventHandler.UriImprinter.ImprintUri(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Imprints a query value onto an URL; useful for fingerprinting client resource link URLs such as JS and CSS files.
member.param: String representation of a URL
The key to imprint into the scriptFileUri's query segment
The value to imprint into the scriptFileUri's query segment
member.returns: An imprinted URI string
member.remarks: This will overwrite any existing query values with the same key as the one specified in querystringFingerprintKey. This method also uses the System.Uri and System.UriBuilder classes to do a lot of the heavy lifting; it will simplify URLs that contain . and .. directives.

member.name: T:kCura.EventHandler.WrappedStream
member.summary: This class is internal to the EventHandler assembly. It's purpose is to wrap an HttpPostedFile.InputStream in order to prevent it from being disposed.

member.name: T:kCura.MassOperationHandlers.MassOperationHandler
member.summary: Base class for mass operation handlers.

member.name: P:kCura.MassOperationHandlers.MassOperationHandler.Name
member.summary: Gets a name of a mass operation handler.
member.returns: String value indicating a name of a mass operation handler.

member.name: P:kCura.MassOperationHandlers.MassOperationHandler.Helper
member.summary: Gets and/or sets the Helper property of the mass operation handler which returns IMOHHelper object from Relativity.API.

member.name: P:kCura.MassOperationHandlers.MassOperationHandler.LayoutMask
member.summary: Gets and/or sets a layout mask for a current mass operation handler.
member.returns: Returns Artifact object.
member.remarks: This is applicable only for assembly backed mass operation handlers. Custom page mass operation handlers do not require that property to be set.

member.name: P:kCura.MassOperationHandlers.MassOperationHandler.BatchIDs
member.summary: Gets and/or sets a list of integer values indicating ids included in a current batch.

member.name: P:kCura.MassOperationHandlers.MassOperationHandler.MassActionTableName
member.summary: Gets and/or sets a name of a temporary table where all ids will be stored for batching work of a particular mass operation handler.

member.name: M:kCura.MassOperationHandlers.MassOperationHandler.DoBatch
member.summary: Abstract method which will execute a batch.
member.returns: Returns a Response object.
member.remarks: This assumes PreMassOperation method executes successfully.

member.name: M:kCura.MassOperationHandlers.MassOperationHandler.PreMassOperation
member.summary: Abstract method which will be executed prior to DoBatch() method.)
member.returns: Returns a Response object.

member.name: M:kCura.MassOperationHandlers.MassOperationHandler.PostMassOperation
member.summary: Abstract method which will be executed after DoBatch() method.
member.returns: Returns a Response object.
member.remarks: This assumes PreMassOperation() and DoBatch() methods will not throw any exceptions to interrupt the process.

member.name: M:kCura.MassOperationHandlers.MassOperationHandler.ValidateSelection
member.summary: Abstract method which will execute validation of a batch set to be processed.
member.returns: Returns a Response object.
member.remarks: If this method fails the red modal box will be displayed on the mass operation handler popup as well as the OK button will be disabled.

member.name: M:kCura.MassOperationHandlers.MassOperationHandler.ValidateLayout
member.summary: Abstract method which will execute validation of a layout attached to a mass operation handler.
member.returns: Returns a Response object.
member.remarks: This method will execute only on mass operation handlers which are assembly backed with a layout being attached. If it fails it will display a warning modal box inside the mass operation handler.

member.name: M:kCura.MassOperationHandlers.MassOperationHandler.IncrementCount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Method which will update the current count of the executing batch.
member.param: Integer value indicating the current count of an executing batch.
member.remarks: This can be used to update the progress bar on the popup when mass operation handler is executing.

member.name: M:kCura.MassOperationHandlers.MassOperationHandler.ChangeStatus(System.String)
member.summary: Method which will update a status of a mass operation handler execution process.
member.param: String value depicting the current status of a process.

member.name: M:kCura.MassOperationHandlers.MassOperationHandler.IsCancelled
member.summary: Method which returns True if a user clicked Cancel button on currently executing batch.
member.returns: True/False

member.name: E:kCura.MassOperationHandlers.MassOperationHandler.UpdateCount
member.summary: Raises an event to update the current count of executing batch.
member.param: Integer value indicating the current count of an executing batch.

member.name: E:kCura.MassOperationHandlers.MassOperationHandler.UpdateStatus
member.summary: Raises an event to update a status of a mass operation handler execution process.
member.param: String value depicting the current status of a process.

member.name: E:kCura.MassOperationHandlers.MassOperationHandler.CheckCancelled
member.summary: Raises an event of a Cancel button click action on currently executing batch.
member.param: Boolean value indicating if current batch needs to be cancelled.
member.remarks: It is automatically raised when IsCancelled() method is called.
